graph_title: Number of countries with nationally determined contributions, long-term strategies, national adaptation plans and adaptation communications, as reported to the secretariat of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
indicator_definition: National Determined Contributions (NDCs)- https://unfccc.int/sites/default/files/NDC/2022-06/NDC%20of%20Republic%20of%20Armenia%20%202021-2030.pdf . National Adaptation Plans (NAPs) – https://unfccc.int/sites/default/files/resource/NAP_Armenia.pdf. Long-term low greenhouse gas emission development strategy of the republic of armenia (until 2050) - https://unfccc.int/sites/default/files/resource/UNDP%20LT_LEDS_ARMENIA.pdf . National Communication - 1. https://unfccc.int/sites/default/files/resource/NC4_Armenia_.pdf 2. https://unfccc.int/sites/default/files/resource/armnc3.pdf 3. https://unfccc.int/sites/default/files/resource/Revised_Armenia_SNC.pdf 4. https://unfccc.int/sites/default/files/resource/Armenia%20INC.pdf. National Greenhouse Gas Inventory Report (1990- 2019)- https://unfccc.int/sites/default/files/resource/NIR%202019_EN.pdf.
indicator_name: Number of countries with nationally determined contributions, long-term strategies, national adaptation plans and adaptation communications, as reported to the secretariat of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
target: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning
